extension.title: Local Context Project Demonstration
extension.name: LocalContextProject
extension.creator: Aaron Wilton
extension.description:
This IPT extension **demonstrates** how Local Context Labels and Notices could be included in a structured way within resources. Once endorsed, this **may** provide an interim or transitional solution for the provision of Local Contexts information with occurrences while other standards work.
An extended veriant, like that for Measurements and Facts, could be created to allow linkage to occurrences for Sampling Event data.

property.name: RecordID
property.description: The identifier of the occurrence the measurement or fact refers to. If not applicable, it should be left empty.

property.name: RecordDateAdded
property.description: The date on which the occurrence or event was added to the Project. Recommended best practice is to use an encoding scheme, such as ISO 8601:2004(E).

property.name: RecordDateModified
property.description: The date on which the Local Context Project was last modified. Recommended best practice is to use an encoding scheme, such as ISO 8601:2004(E).

property.name: localContextProjectID
property.description: The unique identifier assigned to the project by Local Contexts.

property.name: localContextProjectTitle
property.comments: Optional. This may be included when to ensure this information is available when the data set or records are used offline.
property.description: The project title as recorded in the Local Contexts hub.

property.name: localContextProjectDateAdded
property.comments: Optional. This may be included when to ensure this information is available when the data set or records are used offline.
property.description: The date on which the Local Context Project was added. Recommended best practice is to use an encoding scheme, such as ISO 8601:2004(E).

property.name: ProvidersProjectID
property.comments: Optional. This may be included when to ensure this information is available when the data set or records are used offline.
property.description: A unique identifier for a project assigned by project creator. Included to assist cross-linking and searching.

property.name: localContextProjectPage
property.comments: Optional. This may be included when to provide a direct link to the Local Contexts Project for data users.
property.description: The url to view the Local Context Project page.

property.name: localContextBCLabels
property.comments: Optional. This may be included to support users when working offline, archiving of data sets, and to enable systems to display Label iconics without having to call the Local Contexts API.
property.description: The type values for the Biocultural Labels that have been applied by the project. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

property.name: localContextTKLabels
property.comments: Optional. This may be included to support users when working offline, archiving of data sets, and to enable systems to display Label iconics without having to call the Local Contexts API.
property.description: The name of the Traditional Knowledge Labels that have been applied by the project. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

property.name: localContextNotices
property.comments: Optional. This may be included to support users when working offline, archiving of data sets, and to enable systems to display Label iconics without having to call the Local Contexts API.
property.description: The name of Notices that have been applied by the project. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

property.name: localContextBCLabelsID
property.comments: Optional. This may be included to support systems to retrieve Label information via the Local Context API.
property.description: A list of the unique Local Context UUID assigned to each label listed in BClabels. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

property.name: localContextTKLabelsID
property.comments: Optional. This may be included to support systems to retrieve Label information via the Local Context API.
property.description: A list of the unique Local Context UUID assigned to each label listed in TKLabels. This should be provided as a | delimited string.

property.name: localContextNoticesID
property.comments: Optional. This may be included to support systems to retrieve Label information via the Local Context API.
property.description: A list of the unique Local Context UUID assigned to each Notice listed in localContextNotices. This should be provided as a | delimited string.
